scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn workspaces run build
scripts.clean: concurrently "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/world run clean" "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/level1-ca run clean" "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/pokemon-extension run clean" "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/simulator run clean"
scripts.deploy: concurrently -n contracts,client -c cyan,magenta "cd packages/contracts && yarn run dev" "cd packages/client && yarn run deploy"
scripts.dev: yarn run clean && yarn run dev-no-clean
scripts.dev-no-clean: yarn run build:ca-sim && yarn run deploy:ca && yarn run deploy:sim && concurrently -n world -c yellow "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/world run deploy:local"
scripts.deploy:ca: concurrently -n level1 -c blue "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/level1-ca run deploy:local"
scripts.deploy:sim: concurrently -n sim -c red "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/simulator run deploy:local"
scripts.deploy:pokemon: concurrently -n pokemon -c green "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/pokemon-extension run deploy:local"
scripts.initSpawn: concurrently -n terrain -c magenta "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/terrain-deployer run deploySpawn"
scripts.build:ca-sim: concurrently -n level1,sim -c blue,red "cd packages/level1-ca && yarn run build:local && yarn workspace @tenetxyz/pokemon-extension run build:local" "cd packages/simulator && yarn run build:local"
scripts.mud:up: yarn workspaces foreach -t run yarn mud set-version -v canary && yarn install
